title: Hob
notes: Game wont start when launching normal. When starting with (no launcher) option, there is an OGRE exception.

title: Hob
notes: There is an exception at game start, when ignored it starts.

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.0-1-amd64, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Starts with  PROTON_USE_WINED3D11 set, however appears very dark.
title: Hob

notes: Is possible to start with PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1, however the performance is pretty bad (~10-20FPS on medium settings), there are graphic-bugs and the game crashes reliably when trying to access the teleporter
title: Hob

notes: Shows only a black screen, exits to desktop after some time
title: Hob

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Ivybridge Mobile x86/MMX/SSE2
title: Hob

notes: Saw only a black sceen at first, but after running it in "windowed mode" from the launcher, I got an error message, and once i clicked "ignore" on that it started running. After this it ran also in "windowed fullscreen". Visuals, sounds and controls seemed OK. Tested only a few minutes.
title: Hob

notes: Launcher/configurator works properly; did not see any errors when starting the game with or without launcher. No tweaks used, but Proton 3.16-3 and Nvidia 396.54.09 or equivalent drivers might be needed (stream output). Game froze once during the opening credits, but went without a hitch on the second attempt. Good performance and full controller support.
title: Hob
